This toast will be displayed after the view redirects to the previous page.

Automatically display toasts on specific route (requires ngRoute):


  app.controller('ToastController',
    ['$scope','$location','tjToast',
    function($scope, $location, tjToast) {
    
    // listen for path changes; if path=/, run toasts
    $scope.$on('$routeChangeSuccess', function(){
      var path = $location.path();
      if( path == '/' ){
        tjToast.now();
      }
    });
    
  }]);
